name: Track & Field
overview: Challenge the olympic world records! Athletes from all over the world converge in a single location to proove their worth, in the greatest sports competition of all time: The olympic games! In Konami's Track & Field, you can join them and get a nice work-out in the process! One or two players participate in such time-honored olympic events as the 100-meter dash, the long jump and the hammer throw. In each event, the player must qualify against a pre-determined time or distance in order to proceed to the next event. If not, the competition is over. The points added to your score after each event
